content.refrain: Ave, ave, ave, Maria! Ave, ave, Maria!
verses:
Immaculate Mary, your praises we Sing;
You reign now in splendor with Jesus, our King.

In heaven the blessed your glory proclaim;
On earth we, your children, invoke your sweet name.

Your name is our power, your virtues our light;
Your love is our comfort, your prayers our might.

We pray for the Church, our true mother on earth;
And beg you to watch o'er the land of our birth.
